title: IMMZD18SPneumococcal3Doses ValueSet for Decision Table Display Values

^https?://.*.description: Display values for a specific IRI-formatted code by language

^[a-z]{2}(-[A-Z]{2})?$.description: Display value in the specified language (ISO 639-1 code)

http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeS.en: First pneumococcal dose from the primary series was administered
First pneumococcal dose from the primary series was administered to client, who is less than or equal to 5 years of age, within 24 months post birth
Second pneumococcal dose from the primary series was administered

First pneumococcal dose from the primary series was administered to client, who is less than or equal to 5 years of age. Pneumococcal dose was not administered within 24 months post birth. Client is at high risk for pneumococcal infection.
Second pneumococcal dose from the primary series was administered to client, who is less than or equal to 5 years of age. First pneumococcal dose was administered within 12 months post birth.
Third pneumococcal dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed.

Third pneumococcal dose from the primary series was administered to client, who is more than 12 months of age. The latest pneumococcal dose was administered within 12 months post birth. Client is either HIV positive or had preterm birth.
One pneumococcal booster dose was administered.
